channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mets Owner Steve Cohen to Stop Trading For His Hedge Fund
item.description: The billionaire plans to remain at the firm and focus on strategy and mentoring.

item.title: Splunk Cloud Platform Attains FedRAMP High Authorization
JPMorgan in Talks With Apple to Take Over Credit Card From Goldman
item.description: JPMorgan could become the new Apple credit-card issuer, but is seeking concessions from the tech company.

item.title: Tupperware files for bankruptcy as its colorful containers lose relevance
The Battle Brewing Over Blood Tests for Cancer
item.description: Positive results of a colon cancer study conducted by Exact Sciences prompt the CEO of competitor Guardant Health to publicly challenge his rival to a...

item.title: Quarterhill Announces Contracts Totaling $5.8 Million to Deploy New Technologies at North Carolina Weigh Stations
Kroger Antitrust Case Could Open Up New Bag of M&A Possibilities
item.description: A victory for the Federal Trade Commission, set to conclude Tuesday, could pave the way for an Amazon buying spree.

item.title: Trimble Dimensions User Conference to Showcase Innovative and Connected Technologies for Construction and Geospatial Industries
Salesforce Needs to Sell Its Latest AI Vision
item.description: The cloud pioneer hopes AI agents make a splash at its Dreamforce conference and rejuvenate growth prospects.

item.title: Apogee Enterprises Announces Date for Fiscal 2025 Second Quarter Financial Results
